docs.snippet: MONTEVIDEO, Dec. 10. -- Delegates to the Pan American Conference today lolled on the sands of Montevideo's famous beaches or went to the horse races run in their honor at Maronas Hippo-drome. With four committees and twelve subcommittees meeting...
docs.lead_paragraph: MONTEVIDEO, Dec. 10. -- Delegates to the Pan American Conference today lolled on the sands of Montevideo's famous beaches or went to the horse races run in their honor at Maronas Hippo-drome. With four committees and twelve subcommittees meeting tomorrow, they face an intensive program of routine work during the next few days.

docs.snippet: MONTEVIDEO, Uruguay, Dec. 11 -- The Paraguayan delegation to the Pan-American Conference received communiques from Asuncion today confirming reports of the surrender of thirteen Bolivian regiments, with a personnel of 700 officers and 10,000 men.

headline.main: Capture of 10,700 Bolivians Claimed by Foe in Chaco War; Paraguay Calls a Holiday to Celebrate the Taking of Thirteen Regiments in Two Divisions -- La Paz Expects New Call for More Reservists to Enter Army. 10,700 BOLIVIANS REPORTED TAKEN

docs.snippet: MONTEVIDEO, Dec. 11 -- Secretary of State Cordell Hull today abandoned his effort to force the Pan-American Conference to decide its future relations with the League of Nations and other nonregional organizations. At a secret session lasting nearly...
docs.lead_paragraph: MONTEVIDEO, Dec. 11 -- Secretary of State Cordell Hull today abandoned his effort to force the Pan-American Conference to decide its future relations with the League of Nations and other nonregional organizations. At a secret session lasting nearly three hours of the steering committee's subcommittee, Mr. Hull asked that his project to establish a permanent policy committee be deferred until the next conference.
docs.abstract: Drops fight to exclude Longue of Nations fron Pan Amer Conf; clarifies stand

docs.snippet: In the heart of South America, Paraguay and Bolivia have been waging a war in a wilderness for a year and a half. The battleground has been in the almost trackless jungle of the Gran Chaco Boreal, a disputed territory of about 100,000 square miles,...
docs.lead_paragraph: In the heart of South America, Paraguay and Bolivia have been waging a war in a wilderness for a year and a half. The battleground has been in the almost trackless jungle of the Gran Chaco Boreal, a disputed territory of about 100,000 square miles, lying in the angle formed by the junction of the Pilcomayo and Paraguay Rivers.

headline.main: HEAVY LOSSES MARK FIGHTING IN CHACO; The Toll Was Proportionately Heavier Than Our World War Casualties.

docs.lead_paragraph: MONTEVIDEO, Dec. 12 -- Secretary of State Cordell Hull of the United States today called on the nations of the Western Hemisphere to lower their tariffs and to invite the rest of the world, through the London Economic Conference, to follow their example.

docs.snippet: MONTEVIDEO, Dec. 12 -- In the first teat vote on women's rights at the Pan-American Conference, a subcommittee today rejected, three to two, the treaty on equal civil and political rights. The treaty on equal nationality rights, however, was...
docs.lead_paragraph: MONTEVIDEO, Dec. 12 -- In the first teat vote on women's rights at the Pan-American Conference, a subcommittee today rejected, three to two, the treaty on equal civil and political rights. The treaty on equal nationality rights, however, was unanimously approved.
docs.abstract: Pan Amer Conf subcom rejects treaty on equal civil and pol rights; treaty on equal nationality rights approved
